title: coordinates
description: The Coordinates data type indicates the position (in pixels) of the midpoint of a visualized CACAO object relative to the upper left (origin - O) corner of a canvas, along with its connections (paths) to other objects.

x.description: A number (ùïé - whole number) representing the X coordinate of the midpoint of the object visualized relative to the canvas's upper-left (origin - O) corner. This number refers to pixels.

y.description: A number (ùïé - whole number) representing the Y coordinate of the midpoint of the object visualized relative to the canvas's upper-left (origin - O) corner. This number refers to pixels.

outgoing_connections.description: The outgoing connections (paths) of the object visualized.
